title: can we get a suicide ping "dont delete for being in the wrong board plz"
body: as a {{champion:27}} main. i would like to be able to ping that im killing myself, and for my team not to help me get away and die in the process. im hesitant to say it in chat out of fear of getting troll reported and "suiciding" being flagged by the IFS. it would be nice if i could have a ping. "make it something like a skull or something" plus pings are faster and arent muted as often

replies.body:
"On the way"
"Fall back"

Shouldn't those be enough?
That's what I do in ARAM.
